messages.content: I'm the instructor at the front of a class. I've got three down. I'm not sure if they're all dead, but I'm pretty sure.

I had a student that had withdrawn from the program. She came to me earlier looking for help. I sent her to get her transcripts, then she went to someone else's office, and then she came back to my office.

I asked her to take a seat for a minute until I could finish the tests, and then she just started shooting. I hit the ground, and when I turned around, everyone else hit the ground with me. When I got up, she was reloading the gun.
Was she a black or white female?
Black, heavyset, real curly hair. She shot two other people and then shot herself.
Okay. And what room were you in?
Alright, stay on the line. Help is on the way.
